summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the Superintendent to accept an assignment of the P-Patch Trust's rights to purchase land in Block 3, Hillman City Division No. 3, according to the Plat thereof, Recorded in Volume 11 of Plats, Page 38, records of King County, Washington; authorizing the purchase of said property; authorizing the Superintendent to grant a conservation easement and covenant with respect to such property in exchange for a conservation easement and covenant on adjacent property of the P-Patch Trust and the P-Patch Trust's payment of a part of the purchase price of the property being acquired by the City; authorizing the operation of such property as a P-Patch; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
